item.title: Issue #1962 created
item.description:
fn:map-to-element

As this feature request has been reported back to us more than once, I want to raise the question here if we want to introduce a function that inverts the result of fn:map-to-element back to an XML representation â€“ provided that a conversion plan exists.

Many results would certainly be lossy, but as the plan is now available separately, it would be possible to roundtrip a lot of data with regular structures, without having to write custom conversion code.
